txt.en: Now to treat the Rangers!
A mortar and pestle can be found at Barad Orhant.\n\nYou should grind up the ingredients.
A mortar and pestle can be found at Barad Orhant.\n\nYou should remove the potential remedy from the mortar and pestle.
Resilient mould, glimmering salt, and Agarnaith fruit can all be found in Minas Morgul.\n\nYou should recover these ingredients.
A Morgul Remedy
Find a bit of resilient mould ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Sick Rangers can be found in Barad Orhant.\n\nYou should treat the Rangers with the potential remedy.
Talk to Arodor in Barad Orhant

'Many different things survive in the gloom of Imlad Morgul. It would seem that some have developed an immunity to the foul air near the Dead City. Perhaps we must look for a remedy in things that thrive in the harsh realm of Mordor. Moulds, fruit, and salts come to mind. As long as the ingredients are not poisonous, it is certainly our best option.\n\n'I ask you to seek out whichever ingredients you can find. Bringing the sick back to Gondor would be no different than abandoning our mission! We must attempt to find a remedy here in the city.'
Found resilient mould ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Did it work? I am full of amazement that it does not appear to be poisonous! I mean.... I did not doubt that it would work, friend.\n\n'We owe you our gratitude.'
Treat the Rangers with the potential remedy ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Treated Ranger ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Find a speck of glimmering salt ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Found Agarnaith fruit ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Grind up the ingredients with a mortar and pestle at Barad Orhant
Found glimmering salt ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Find some Agarnaith fruit ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Arodor can be found in Barad Orhant.\n\nYou should talk to Arodor.
You have concocted a potential remedy... you hope!
Some of the Rangers of Ithilien have taken ill as Arodor continues his search for a remedy to this strange Morgul ailment.
Remove the potential remedy from the mortar and pestle
